0.text: Innate: After casting an ability, Lucian's next basic attack on-attack within 3.5 seconds fires an additional shot after 0.25 seconds, which deals 50 / 55 / 60% (based on level) AD physical damage, increased to 100% AD against  minions.
0.html: Innate: After casting an ability, Lucian's next basic attack on-attack within 3.5 seconds fires an additional shot after 0.25 seconds, which deals 50 / 55 / 60% (based on level) AD physical damage, increased to 100% AD against minions.

1.text: The second shot applies  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness and is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
1.html: The second shot applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness and is affected by critical strike modifiers.

2.text: If Lucian's primary target is killed before the second shot can go off, he automatically shoots another enemy in range.
2.html: If Lucian's primary target is killed before the second shot can go off, he automatically shoots another enemy in range.

3.text: Innate - Vigilance: Whenever Lucian is  healed,  shielded or granted a buff by an ally, his next two shots within 6 seconds are empowered to deal 14 (+ 20% AD) bonus magic damage  on-hit. The empowered shots can stack up to 4 times and applies against structures.
3.html: Innate - Vigilance: Whenever Lucian is healed, shielded or granted a buff by an ally, his next two shots within 6 seconds are empowered to deal 14 (+ 20% AD) bonus magic damage on-hit. The empowered shots can stack up to 4 times and applies against structures.

0.text: Active: Lucian fires a laser in a line in the direction of the target enemy, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Lucian fires a laser in a line in the direction of the target enemy, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.

0.text: Active: Lucian fires a missile in the target direction that explodes in a cross pattern upon hitting an enemy or maximum range, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and granting  sight of the area for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Lucian fires a missile in the target direction that explodes in a cross pattern upon hitting an enemy or maximum range, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and granting sight of the area for 1 second.

1.text: Enemies hit are marked for 6 seconds.

2.text: Lucian gains  bonus movement speed for 1 second when he or allied champions damage a marked target. Allied champions triggering this effect grant Lucian  Vigilance.
2.html: Lucian gains  bonus movement speed for 1 second when he or allied champions damage a marked target. Allied champions triggering this effect grant Lucian Vigilance.

0.text: Passive: Relentless Pursuit's cooldown is  reduced by 1 second for each  Lightslinger shot hit, doubled to 2 seconds against enemy  champions.
0.html: Passive: Relentless Pursuit's cooldown is  reduced by 1 second for each Lightslinger shot hit, doubled to 2 seconds against enemy champions.

1.text: Active: Lucian  dashes in the target direction.
1.html: Active: Lucian dashes in the target direction.

2.text: Relentless Pursuit  resets Lucian's basic attack timer. Lucian can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Relentless Pursuit will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Relentless Pursuit resets Lucian's basic attack timer. Lucian can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Relentless Pursuit will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Lucian  channels for up to 3 seconds, rapidly firing up to 22 (+ 1 per 4% critical strike chance) shots in the target direction. Each shot deals physical damage to the first enemy hit, doubled against  minions. The Culling can be recast after 0.75 seconds during the channel, and does so automatically when the channel ends.
0.html: Active: Lucian channels for up to 3 seconds, rapidly firing up to 22 (+ 1 per 4% critical strike chance) shots in the target direction. Each shot deals physical damage to the first enemy hit, doubled against minions. The Culling can be recast after 0.75 seconds during the channel, and does so automatically when the channel ends.

1.text: While channeling, Lucian is  ghosted and may still move and cast  Relentless Pursuit.
1.html: While channeling, Lucian is ghosted and may still move and cast Relentless Pursuit.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Cloudburst: Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within 750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (110 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CLOUDBURST:  Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within 750 units of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (110 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2% bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: MYTHIC PASSIVE: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2% bonus movement speed.
